articles.title: Asia-Pacific stocks mostly slip; Xiaomi shares in Hong Kong surge more than 2% - CNBC
articles.description: Industrial profits in China soared 57% year-on-year in April, the National Bureau of Statistics said Thursday.
articles.content:
